context_of_use: This use case allows patients to access and review their laboratory and diagnostic test results online.
stakeholders_and_interests: patient: access and review test results for health awareness
description: Enable patients to access and review their laboratory and diagnostic test results online.
triggering_event: Patient requests to view test results.
preconditions: Patient is logged into their account.
Test results are available in the system.
postconditions: Patient successfully views their test results.
assumptions: The patient has the necessary permissions to view their test results.
The system is operational and accessible.
requirements_met: The system shall allow patients to view their test results once they are available.
outstanding_issues: Clarification on the types of test results available for viewing.
main_flow: 1. Patient requests to view test results → System displays available test results.
2. Patient selects a specific test result → System shows detailed information about the selected test result.
3. Patient reviews the test result → System allows patient to navigate back to the list of test results.
alternative_flows: AF-1 (from Step 1): If no test results are available, then the system informs the patient that no results are currently available.
exception_flows: EF-1 (from Step 1): If the patient is not logged in, then the system prompts the patient to log in before accessing test results.
